title: AHS: Everything We Know About Tate Langdon
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: You left out a HUGE piece of info....the house used Tate as a “puppet” for evil. Madison didn’t wipe Violet’s memory...she made her aware of that fact.
Like why am I so freaking attracted to a psychopath

Making it so "the house did it" to absolve tate really takes away from the fact that constance's womb was "cursed". That all her kids came out deformed and the one that came out "perfect" was a psychotic murderer

"Don't you die on me!" <3 
(Gets me every time)
description:
Murder House's Tate Langdon is one of the most horrifying characters we've seen on American Horror Story and he's part of the reason why the Antichrist Michael Langdon is bringing the Apocalypse. Find out Everything You Need To Know About Tate Langdon.

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
